critical_bug.issue: last_sync field never updated during sync
critical_bug.evidence: sync works (processes 50 resources), but fabric.last_sync remains null
critical_bug.impact: Web interface always shows 'Never Synced' even when sync is working
critical_bug.description: GitDirectorySync.sync_from_git() updates individual CR records but never updates fabric.last_sync
critical_bug.user_symptom: Exactly matches user's observation: watched for several minutes, saw 'Never Synced'
